resources.string: The Keyboard is not properly setup.
This is a simple keyboard for Meitei Mayek.\nThis project is an OpenSource Project developed just to teach others and to help in the development of our Meitei Culture on the way of Technology.

This keyboard may not work on some older devices. Old version of Android (usually 4.4 and below) doesn\'t support the Meitei Mayek Font by default but most of the newer devices does except for some.\nBy \"not work\" I mean that Meitei Mayek Font may not be rendered when you type but it will still render it perfectly on the keyboard itself and this application.\nIf you have an older version device and the font doesn\'t render at all, you can install the NotoSansMeiteiMayek Font directly on your device.
I (Gyanendro Kh) developed this app just for fun.\nIf any complaint or feedback, feel free to contact me.

This application is an OpenSource Application.\nThe Source Code for this application is hosted on Github. Anyone who wish to contribute can send a pull request. Let\'s develop this application together, help me make it better.

Seems like you skipped the previous step.
Select to keyboard by clicking the button below.\nA popup dialog box will appear, Click OK in it.
To start using the keyboard you need to set \"MM Keyboard\" as your default keyboard.\nClick the Button Below and Select MM Keyboard from the pop up list.
Keyboard is all set up.\nYou can now start typing in Meitei Mayek Script
